titles.title: Home Care Protection Act of 1987
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to allow medicare coverage for home health services provided on a daily basis.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Home Care Protection Act of 1987 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide that nursing care and home health aid services may be provided on a daily basis as home health services for up to 60 days with monthly physician certification of the need for such services, and after the 60-day period on a physician certification of exceptional circumstances.
